sqlMap.select: SELECT unit_no, peripheral_no, peripheral_type, tag_number, acquired_date, description, serial_no, brand, model, color, remarks, user_id, last_update FROM ims_peripherals_1

SELECT a.unit_no unit_no, peripheral_no, peripheral_type, a.tag_number tag_number, a.acquired_date acquired_date, a.description description, a.serial_no serial_no, a.brand brand, a.model model, a.color color, a.remarks remarks, a.user_id user_id, a.last_update last_update FROM ims_peripherals_1 a , ims_comp_units_1 b where a.unit_no = b.unit_no and b.unit_no = #no#
SELECT unit_no, peripheral_no, peripheral_type, tag_number, acquired_date, description, serial_no, brand, model, color, remarks, user_id, last_update FROM ims_peripherals_1 WHERE peripheral_no = #id#
sqlMap.insert: BEGIN INSERT INTO ims_peripherals_1 (unit_no, peripheral_no, peripheral_type, tag_number, acquired_date, description, serial_no, brand, model, color, remarks, user_id, last_update) VALUES(#unitNo#, #peripheralNo#, #peripheralType#, #tagNumber#, #acquiredDate#, #description#, #serialNo#, #brand#, #model#, #color#, #remarks#, #userId#, sysdate); END;
sqlMap.update: BEGIN UPDATE ims_peripherals_1 SET peripheral_type = #peripheralType#, tag_number = #tagNumber#, acquired_date = #acquiredDate#, description = #description#, serial_no = #serialNo#, brand = #brand#, model = #model#, color = #color#, remarks = #remarks#, user_id = #userId#, last_update = sysdate WHERE peripheral_no = #peripheralNo# END;
